Dear DAvid

Kono Haruaki certainly used another kanji for 'haru', as illust=
rated 
in Kinko Meikan pp.357a-360d and as listed in Nihon To Koza, but 
Mu=
rakami Haruaki would appear to fit your requirements.

Thank you for the ad=
ditional photographs - a lovely tsuba.  It would 
have made life too easy i=
f the kao had been included!

Regards, John L.
